enhanced_objects.name: herd

enhanced_objects.name: blanket

enhanced_objects.name: cooker

A herd is a concept that can be represented by a picture on the wall or the horse itself representing the herd.

selected_scene.scene_brief: A Outdoor Market featuring onion, with swing, tennis racket, horse, wheel, herd, basin displayed on shelves, blanket, and cooker

final_prompts.main_prompt: A Impressionism painting depicting a harmonious rural scene bathed in the soft, mixed light of a tranquil afternoon. In the foreground, a large, cozy blanket in muted rose and soft sage is draped over a weathered swing hanging from a sturdy branch. Beside it, a medium-sized wheel with warm ochre and iron black tones stands aged and rustic, next to a medium basin of deep cobalt and warm cream, clean and functional. A medium, modern tennis racket in deep graphite and cream leans against a large, off-white cooker with chrome accents, both appearing well-maintained. A single, small onion with warm amber and rose blush hues rests on the blanket, fresh and firm. In the midground, a large, rich chestnut horse with dark mahogany markings stands alert and calm. Further back, a large herd of earth brown and soft tan horses grazes peacefully across the field. The entire composition is balanced and harmonious, with dappled light filtering through the scene.
final_prompts.negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3d render, modern, digital art, photograph, low quality, blurry, distorted
